page.title: 03MORGAN MOTORS
page.content: Morgan Motors in Malvern is the only place in the world which makes the famous Morgans. They have a two seater or four seater, which can cost anything from Â£9,000 up to Â£14,000. Morgans are hand made and have a wooden chassis. The waiting list for a Morgan is five years. There are about one hundred and fifteen people who work at Morgan Motors. one hundred people work on the factory floor and fifteen people work in the offices. Three types of engines are used for the Morgans. They are the Ford XR3, the Fiat injected engine and the Rover engines. Morgans started in 1902 by Mr. Morgan's father and it has been passed down the family. Only about eight Morgans are made a week because they are hand made.
